title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Web-Based CAI Integrated Database System

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental SQL Syntax and Familiarity with Relational Database Concepts
context.additional_context: Work-integrated design for employees, providing a theory-practice integrated learning environment using web-based CAI systems

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain five major database models (relational, document, key-value, columnar, graph)
Learners can perform at least two stages of data normalization based on real-world business scenarios
Learners can simulate transaction processing algorithms and propose performance optimization strategies using web-based CAI tools

resources: Web-Based CAI (Computer-Assisted Instruction) Learning Management System

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
